text: company appointments
offer organizations a chance to meet
with small groups of students
up to 10 on a schedule that makes sense
for your organization
some organizations will do a
presentation others will take it as a
chance to chat informally with a small
group of interested students
on topics that make the most sense you
could chat with students about their
background
and what they want to do and take it as

about what those students

i think one of the big advantages of
company appointments
is the second year students are well
informed about your organization and
what you do
so you don't necessarily need to take
the time to explain
your organization and the different
areas that you might be recruiting for
unless you want to but i think for the

are ready to talk about the sort of
impact they will have
and it really gives you a chance to

who are targeting your organization for
